name: BlackviewSecurity

”Alexa open the lock”
”Alexa close the lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Blackview Security is the company's operating platform for whole-house smart hardware device access, user control and management of smart devices. Not only is it convenient to easily access smart device hardware in the home, but it can also classify, control, and personalize the connected hardware devices. It can also be shared with family members, remotely view device push events, and manage device information. Push notifications, set device personalization and other functions.
